name: Website Dev Environment
postCreateCommand: apk add --no-cache curl git darkhttpd && curl -fsSL https://github.com/biomejs/biome/releases/latest/download/biome-linux-x64-musl -o /tmp/biome && chmod 755 /tmp/biome && mv /tmp/biome /usr/local/bin/biome && git config --global --add safe.directory /workspaces/website && /usr/local/bin/biome --version
